name: Dinner for One
description:
This is a tour of a place that for the longest time I thought I went to as a kid. Recently I've come to terms that I probably dreamed it. I never got to see an up-close view of the piano before my parents called me away in my dream so neither do you. Point-and-Click to move.

Drawn with Crayola markers on printer paper.

Made in Godot, and the docs say it only works in browsers that support WebGL 2, so Firefox and Chromium browsers (Chrome, Opera) should work. I tested it in Firefox and Chrome, but it runs better in Chrome.

This is the first "game" I've made in Godot.

Music:

Madelene (ID 1315)
by Lobo Loco

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Lobo_Loco/aa-sea/madelene-id-1315

I added some reverb and changed it to a .ogg file
